Pre-Game Insights: Belgium aims for back-to-back wins in the UEFA Nations League after their win against Israel.
Kevin De Bruyne will play despite having the opportunity for a hat-trick in the previous match.
Jeremy Doku and Leandro Trossard are key players to watch on the wings.
Openda is likely to lead the attack with Lukaku and Batshuayi absent.
The midfield features Youri Tielemans and Andre Onana, focusing on control and creativity.
